parameters.name: seed

param_schema.title: Seed
param_schema.description: Random seed. Leave blank to randomize the seed

parameters.description: Random seed. Leave blank to randomize the seed

parameters.name: prompt_end

param_schema.title: Prompt End
param_schema.description: Prompt to end the animation with. You can include multiple prompts by separating the prompts with | (the 'pipe' character)

parameters.description: Prompt to end the animation with. You can include multiple prompts by separating the prompts with | (the 'pipe' character)

parameters.name: prompt_start

param_schema.title: Prompt Start
param_schema.description: Prompt to start the animation with

parameters.description: Prompt to start the animation with

parameters.name: gif_ping_pong

param_schema.title: Gif Ping Pong
param_schema.description: Whether to reverse the animation and go back to the beginning before looping

parameters.description: Whether to reverse the animation and go back to the beginning before looping

parameters.name: prompt_strength

param_schema.title: Prompt Strength
param_schema.description: Lower prompt strength generates more coherent gifs, higher respects prompts more but can be jumpy

parameters.description: Lower prompt strength generates more coherent gifs, higher respects prompts more but can be jumpy

parameters.name: film_interpolation

param_schema.title: Film Interpolation
param_schema.description: Whether to use FILM for between-frame interpolation (film-net.github.io)

parameters.description: Whether to use FILM for between-frame interpolation (film-net.github.io)

parameters.name: intermediate_output

param_schema.title: Intermediate Output
param_schema.description: Whether to display intermediate outputs during generation

parameters.description: Whether to display intermediate outputs during generation

parameters.name: num_interpolation_steps

param_schema.title: Num Interpolation Steps
param_schema.description: Number of steps to interpolate between animation frames

parameters.description: Number of steps to interpolate between animation frames
